verses.verse: The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> concerning <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> O <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> For [Tyre] is <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> [or] <S%H935>harbor;<s%> It is <S%H1540>reported<s%> to them from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3794>Cyprus.<s%>

Be <S%H1826>silent,<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>coastland,<s%> You <S%H5503>merchants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon;<s%> Your <S%H4390>messengers<s%> <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>

And [were] on <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%> The <S%H2233>grain<s%> of the <S%H7883>Nile,<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of the <S%H2975>River<s%> was her <S%H8393>revenue;<s%> And she was the <S%H5504>market<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> O <S%H6721>Sidon;<s%> For the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H559>speaks,<s%> the <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H9123>travailed<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3205>given<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> I have <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1431>brought<s%> up <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> [nor] <S%H7311>reared<s%> <S%H1330>virgins.<s%>"
<S%H9201>When<s%> the <S%H8088>report<s%> [reaches] <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> They will be in <S%H9123>anguish<s%> at the <S%H8088>report<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%>

Is <S%H384>this<s%> your <S%H5947>jubilant<s%> [city,] Whose <S%H6927>origin<s%> is from <S%H6927>antiquity,<s%> Whose <S%H7272>feet<s%> used to <S%H2986>carry<s%> her to <S%H1481>colonize<s%> <S%H7350>distant<s%> places?

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H3289>planned<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> the <S%H5849>bestower<s%> of <S%H5849>crowns,<s%> <S%H834>Whose<s%> <S%H5503>merchants<s%> were <S%H8269>princes,<s%> whose <S%H9211>traders<s%> were the <S%H3513>honored<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>?

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H3289>planned<s%> it to <S%H2490>defile<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H9469>beauty,<s%> To <S%H7043>despise<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3513>honored<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H5674>Overflow<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%> like the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H9253>restraint.<s%>

He has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> out <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> He has made the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> <S%H7264>tremble;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>given<s%> a <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> to <S%H8045>demolish<s%> its <S%H4581>strongholds.<s%>

And He has <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H5937>exult<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H5750><s%> O <S%H6231>crushed<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3794>Cyprus;<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> you will <S%H5117>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5117>rest.<s%>"

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> – <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H5971>people<s%> [which] was not; <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H3245>appointed<s%> it for <S%H9478>desert<s%> <S%H9478>creatures<s%> – they <S%H6965>erected<s%> their <S%H969>siege<s%> <S%H969>towers,<s%> they <S%H6209>stripped<s%> its <S%H759>palaces,<s%> they <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H9281>ruin.<s%>

Now it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> will be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> for <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%> At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> it will <S%H1961>happen<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> as [in] the <S%H9598>song<s%> of the harlot: <S%H2181><s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> [your] <S%H3658>harp,<s%> <S%H5437>walk<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> O <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H2181>harlot;<s%> <S%H5059>Pluck<s%> the <S%H5059>strings<s%> <S%H3190>skillfully,<s%> sing <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7892>songs,<s%> That you may be <S%H2142>remembered.<s%>

And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%> Then she will <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to her <S%H2181>harlot<s%>'s <S%H868>wages,<s%> and will <S%H2181>play<s%> the harlot with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And her <S%H5504>gain<s%> and her harlot's <S%H868>wages<s%> will be <S%H6944>set<s%> <S%H6944>apart<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it will not be <S%H686>stored<s%> up or <S%H2630>hoarded,<s%> but her <S%H5504>gain<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7654>sufficient<s%> <S%H398>food<s%> and <S%H6266>choice<s%> <S%H4374>attire<s%> for those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
